# NSWritingToolsCoordinator.TextUpdateReason.typing

**Case**

An operation that involved a person editing the text in your view.

## Declaration

```swift
case typing
```

## Discussion

Specify this option when the changes come from the text input system.

## Getting the reasons

- **NSWritingToolsCoordinator.TextUpdateReason.undoRedo**: An operation that changed the view’s text as part of an undo or redo command.
